name: RRPETHOME Large Elevated Cooling Dog Bed, Raised Dog Cot Beds for Large Dogs, Elevated Outdoor Pet Bed, Chew Proof Portable Cooling Pet Cot with Skid-Resistant Feet and Breathable Mesh
short_description: 【STRONG & DURABLE COOLING DOG BED】: Crafted with heavy-duty Teslin mesh, this elevated dog bed resists scratching and chewing while providing firm support and even weight distribution to reduce joint and muscle strain. The strength-tested lightweight metal frame supports dogs up to 65 lbs, ensuring excellent stability and durability — perfect for active pets who love to scratch and play.

【U-SHAPED PILLOW ELEVATED DOG BED】:This outdoor dog bed features a U-shaped pillow securely fixed with durable buttons. The U-shaped design allows dogs to curl up naturally, while the raised rim provides head and neck support. The pillow is removable and washable for easy cleaning.

【COOLING LARGE ELEVATED DOG BED】: This elevated dog bed keeps pets off the wet, cold ground. The breathable mesh allows air to flow through, keeping your pet cool even on hot days. The height is ideal for dogs of all ages — from puppies to seniors, and even large dogs with arthritis. Non-slip capped feet help protect your floors.

【DOG BED EASY CARE】: This cooling elevated dog bed is super easy to clean. Pet hair, vomit, and dust can be quickly wiped away, or you can wash the mesh with tap water, a hose, or a damp towel. For a deeper clean, use mild soap or natural cleaning agents. No more worries about pet odors, dirt, or excessive hair. (Note: Wash the U-shaped pillow separately with pet shampoo.)

【EASY ASSEMBLE COOLING ELEVATED DOG BED SIZE】: Outdoor elevated dog bed for medium and large dogs up to 65 lbs. Very easy to assemble — setup takes just minutes, and even seniors or children can do it. The lightweight design adds portability, making it perfect for travel.

name: Suddus Elevated Dog Bed for Large Dogs 140lb, Breathable Cooling Raised Dog Cot with Dual Support Bars & Metal Frame, No-Slip Feet, Waterproof Pet Bed for Indoor/Outdoor, X-Large, 48 * 36 * 9in, Grey
short_description: [Joints Protection]Joints Protection & Skin Health] Protect your extra-large dog from both arthritis pain and skin diseases with the SUDDUS raised dog bed, an ideal solution for your beloved furry companion. This outdoor elevated dog bed acts like a comfortable cot or hammock and keeps your pet cool in hot weather.

[Durable Dog Cot] Dual steel support bars and 4 non-slip rubber feet keep it stable and increase load capacity. The 0.8mm thick steel pipe bars are hard to break. Holds 140lbs – stable even for Great Danes jumping on/off. This outdoor dog bed evenly distributes weight and offers hammock-like comfort.

[Cooling Dog Bed] Upgrade to a hot-pressed one-piece PVC bed cover for chew-resistance and tear prevention. Not ideal for teething dogs or extreme chewers. The mesh design enables free air flow, keeping your dog cool and comfy in any weather. The waterproof Teslin fabric can be hosed off to remove dirt easily and air-dries quicker than traditional mat.

[Detachable and Easy to Clean] The SUDDUS elevated dog bed is versatile and easy to clean. It's like a detachable cot with tutorial videos and instructions, making it easy to disassemble and reassemble. Choose the portable dog cot option for on-the-go use.

[Excellent After-sale Service] Designed with non-slip rubber pads and anti-skid plastic accessories, the SUDDUS elevated dog bed offers protection in every way. Enjoy a 24-hour online service and 12-month warranty, including free replacement of plastic parts and replacement covers within one year.

Upgrade to the SUDDUS raised dog bed today and give your pet the comfort and support they deserve. Please note that this product is not suitable for teething periods or excessive chewers. Choose the SUDDUS elevated dog bed and see the difference for yourself!

name: Elevated Dog Bed Pet cot for Small Dogs, Indoor and Outdoor Use for Small Pets
short_description: 【The Dog Bed with Comfortable Fabric】This elevated dog bed features a soft and comfortable fabric that is gentle on your pet's skin, reducing any skin irritation. The fabric is also easy to clean and replace, keeping your pet cozy and clean.

【The Sturdy, Durable, and Heavy-Duty Dog Cot】Our tee is a new generation of heavy load bearing tee, specially designed and produced using high-quality materials. Its structure is rational, the walls are thickened, the toughness is high, and it is anti-aging. Each tee can bear 40 pounds of weight without cracking, so you can use our small dog bed with confidence.

【The Raised Dog Bed with Stainless Steel Pipe Frame】The frame of the pet bed is made of stainless steel, which provides better load-bearing capacity. The stainless steel pipes do not have a paint coating, so they won't peel or fade, are resistant to corrosion, and won't be damaged by rust.

【The Stylish and High-end Cot Dog Bed】Our outdoor dog bed is made of stainless steel, a white thickened tee, and a comfortable and soft bedsheet. This stylish and high-end dog bed will be loved by your pet, and it will match your quality of life when placed at home.

【The Easy-to-Install Dog Bed】Installing the outside dog bed requires no tools and comes with an illustrated manual for easy installation. Anyone can easily install and disassemble our dog bed. When disassembled, our dog bed has a very small volume and is easy to carry and store.

name: Elevated Dog Cot Bed Tool-Free Assembly - Outdoor Raised Dog Cooling Bed Frame for Large Pets, Summer Pet Hammock Off Ground with Non-Slip Feet & Waterproof Teslin Mesh, 43x30 Inch
short_description: Tool-Free Assembly in Minutes: No tools needed! Our elevated dog bed assembles effortlessly in minutes. Elastic connecting wires and snap fasteners between steel tubes make setup or takedown a breeze for busy pet parents.
Ultra-Stable, Heavy-Duty Frame: Features reinforced joints, widened non-slip feet for maximum stability, and a weight capacity of 150 lbs. No wobbling—perfect for large breeds or energetic pups!

All-Weather Cooling: Built for indoor/outdoor adventures. Breathable, water-resistant mesh elevates pets 8" for 360° airflow and quick drying. Ideal for poolside, camping, or patio use—keeps dogs cool in summer!

Easy Clean & Portability: Rinse off dirt with a hose or wipe with a damp cloth—stain and odor-resistant. Lightweight yet sturdy, folds flat for car trips, hikes, or backyard moves. Bonus: Elevated design simplifies cleaning underneath!

Quick Setup Tips ❤️: 1. Angle the long tube slightly for smoother insertion. 2. Ensure short tubes show "Inside" label facing up (legs facing outward). 3. Lift when attaching the last leg to align both tube ends easily (prevents misalignment).

name: K&H Pet Products Bolster Dog Cot, Cooling Indoor Outdoor Elevated Cot Hammock Dog Bed with Removable Washable Bolsters, Washable Mesh Cover, Raised Metal Frame - Large 42 X 30in Charcoal
short_description: BOLSTERED OUTDOOR DOG BED: Dog cot bed is made of waterproof, heavy-denier fabric with fluffy plush bolster for ultimate pet comfort and security; Dog hammock design relieves joint pressure points and mesh center eliminates hot spots

ELEVATED DOG COT: Raised dog bed helps pets stay cool in warm spring and summer months by allowing air to circulate and keeps pets off wet/cold ground with 7" ground clearance; keeping your dog off the ground away from dirt, bugs, ticks, ants, etc

STRONG & STURDY: K&H Pet Cot's lightweight metal frame and heavy denier cover holds over 200 pounds, this elevated dog bed is durable and tested for strength; try adding a K&H Canopy (sold separately) to protect your dog & your cot from the sun
TOOL-FREE ASSEMBLY: Easy to assemble and disassemble, no tools necessary making this outside dog bed great for use as a travel dog bed, camping dog bed, beach dog bed and more

MACHINE WASHABLE: Elevated dog bed's removable cover and bolster are both machine washable and can even be hosed off outdoors; extra covers in multiple colors are available for purchase separately as well

INDOOR & OUTDOOR DOG BED: Lifted outdoor dog bed with breathable mesh center is great for indoor and outdoor use and features slip-resistant rubber feet to provide protection for indoor flooring and water-resistant mesh center repels moisture
SIZE: Large measures 42 X 30 X 11.5 and elevates your pet 7" off the ground, perfect for large sized breeds like: Labrador Retriever, German Shepherd, Golden Retriever, Doodle, etc
COLORADO BRAND YOU TRUST: Designed by K&H with 25+ years of experience in creating safe, innovative, quality products for pets, ensuring safe reliability and top-tier craftsmanship for pet parents
product_description: This could just be the most comfortable pet cot outdoor elevated dog bed ever made. The super comfortable bolster envelopes and comforts pets for an incredibly relaxing snooze. Utilizing our original best-selling pet cot outdoor dog bed, the K&H Original Bolster Pet Cot elevated dog bed is sure to please even the pickiest of pets. The bolster is easily removable to quickly convert it into our standard pet cot. The mesh center provides circulation to help pet keep cooler. Holds up to 200 pounds. Small (22" x 17") Medium (32" x 25") Large (42" x 30"). The K&H Pet Cot line of outdoor elevated dog beds features an Original Pet Cot, Original Bolster Pet Cot, Self-Warming pet Cot, Coolin' Pet Cot, and a small Comfy Pet Cot. Replacement covers are for available separately and can easily be interchanged to suit your pets needs for each season. An optional K&H Pet Cot Canopy is available to hook onto any K&H Pet Cot to offer additional shade and cooling power for your pets. PATENTED - U.S. Patent # D992,219 S
